thread.title: BREAKING: Panic as bomb squad finds 'suspicious item' inside suitcase at train station
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Panic as bomb squad finds 'suspicious item' inside suitcase at train station

title: BREAKING: Panic as bomb squad finds 'suspicious item' inside suitcase at train station
text:
BREAKING: Panic as bomb squad finds 'suspicious item' inside suitcase at train station BREAKING: Panic as bomb squad finds 'suspicious item' inside suitcase at train station A BOMB squad has found a 'suspicious item' inside an abandoned suitcase at a busy German train station. PUBLISHED: 10:44,  59, Thu, Feb 2, 2017 NC The abandoned suitcase was found outside a Subway in Siegburg, Germany 
A robot which was sent in to scan the suitcase has found a suspicious item at Sigburg station in front of a Subway restaurant. 
The bomb disposal team are due to carry out a controlled explosion with the robot. 
Cleaners found the abandoned piece of luggage when they came into work at 8am and alerted the police straight away. 
Police rushed to the scene and blocked platform one as well as the Europaplatz square off. 
Passengers were evacuated from the station before the robot was sent in to scan the suitcase. 
This is breaking news. 
Please refresh or return to the page for updates... Most read in World
